title: Mysterious, Discovered, Accepted
description: The triplets are back! Everyone remembers the triplets: Jett, Dylan and Clarissa. They were the ones who could charm anyone's heart at three and now they're all grown up at 17, still as charming as ever. Life is easy going for them, until something, or rather someone, mysterious shows up in their perfect lives undetected. Will this mysterious person be discovered by the kindest of hearts? Depends. Will this person be accepted by those who don't trust him? That's for you to find out.
author: Violet Samuels
